sub_fields.label: Logo
sub_fields.message: To add the logo, please go to Appearance → Customize → Site Identity.

sub_fields.label: Base Colour
sub_fields.name: color_base
sub_fields.instructions: Example usage: color: var(--color-base);. To use as class .color-base.

sub_fields.label: Primary Colour
sub_fields.name: color_primary
sub_fields.instructions: Example usage: color: var(--color-primary);. To use as class .color-primary.

sub_fields.label: Secondary Colour
sub_fields.name: color_secondary
sub_fields.instructions: Example usage: color: var(--color-secondary);. To use as class .color-secondary.

sub_fields.label: More Colours
sub_fields.name: more_colours
sub_fields.instructions:
To use the colour in CSS use var(--color-slug). To use it as a class, use .color-slug. 
If no slug is specified, use var(--color-1). To use as class .color-1. Where the number corresponds with the row.

sub_fields.label: Base Font
sub_fields.name: base_font
sub_fields.instructions: Upload the font files to your theme, or if you're using Google Fonts, paste the embed code in Site Settings → Advanced → Custom HTML → Head. Use .font-base as the class.

sub_fields.label: Title Font
sub_fields.name: title_font
sub_fields.instructions: Upload the font files in the theme. To use as class .font-title.

sub_fields.label: More Fonts
sub_fields.name: more_fonts
sub_fields.instructions: Upload the font files in the theme, or if you're using Google Fonts, paste the embed code in Site Settings → Advanced → Custom HTML → Head. To use the font in CSS, use var(--font-family-1).  To use as class .font-1. Where the number corresponds with the row.

sub_fields.label: Identifier
sub_fields.name: identifier
sub_fields.instructions: Match the identifier from Appearance → Menus → Primary Menu → Menu Item → Megamenu Identifier.

sub_fields.label: Head (Admin)
sub_fields.name: head_admin
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom HTML to the <head> in the page editor. This is useful for embedding fonts to match the frontend styling within the editor.

sub_fields.label: Body
sub_fields.name: body_top
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom HTML after opening of the <body>.

sub_fields.label: Body (Footer)
sub_fields.name: body_footer
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom HTML before closing of the </body>.

fields.label: Gutenberg Settings
fields.name: acf_advanced_gutenberg_settings
fields.instructions: Input the post type slug to apply the theme design when editing the page using Gutenberg.
